class.name: HSeparator
class.brief_description: A horizontal line used for separating other controls.
class.description: A horizontal separator used for separating other controls that are arranged [b]vertically[/b]. [HSeparator] is purely visual and normally drawn as a [StyleBoxLine].

theme_items.theme_item: The height of the area covered by the separator. Effectively works like a minimum height.
The style for the separator line. Works best with [StyleBoxLine].
